subject: Memo, on July 9th, the ancient dragon and the moon will combine to bring you an avalanche of luck
body:
Memo, on April 25th the ancient Dragon and the Moon will combine to bring you an avalanche of luck.













ON JULY 9TH, THE SECRET POWERS OF THE ANCIENT JADE DRAGON WILL SEND YOU AN AVALANCHE OF LUCK...

Dear Memo,
    Now that I've been working with you for a little while, you know that I am attuned to you in a very real and special sense and am always on the lookout for anything that can make your life richer and more fulfilling.
    That’s why I wanted you to know how important it is for you to take advantage of the fact that on July 9th, when the North Node of the Moon aspects Jupiter, the energy and power available to you will be utterly spectacular.
This magnificent Jade Dragon, activated by the Moon’s North Node, can change your life in all the ways that mean most to you









    This spectacular, uniquely-crafted dragon pendant is made from powerful genuine Jade and is encased in regal 18K Gold vermeil. But that is only the beginning of its amazing and beneficial power. 
   Wearing this Dragon can be your first step on a new path and an altogether different journey, one that taps into your real potential once and for all. But you must have it in your hands by July 9th, Memo. That’s the day when Jupiter, the planet of exciting growth and expansion, good luck and rich rewards, will aspect the Moon’s North Node.
    I'm sure you know the power that the Moon has over all of us, over you, but did you know about the Nodes of the Moon and what they can mean for you? 
    Just as you live with the Yin and the Yang in your life, you are also balancing the energies and affects of these incredibly powerful Moon Nodes. The trick is to make them work for you and now I can tell you how. 
    It is a time to stop dreaming and put your goals and ambitions into practice, to bring those dreams, finally, to fruition.
What I see for you and why
    Walking in my garden this morning just as the sun came up, something struck me that I could hardly wait to share with you. I know you'll understand why I feel it is so crucial to you and why you must take it so seriously and do what you can to instantly reap the rewards. I see extraordinary possibilities for you, Memo.
    On beautiful spring days, I always begin my morning with a brisk walk in the garden, breathing in the fresh air deeply and taking stock of the magnificent nature surrounding me. 
    As I was looking at the daffodils I had planted, admiring them in their bright yellow sprightliness, my mind was suddenly filled with a bright and vivid image, so splendid to behold. 
    Watching the sun glancing at them, Memo, this morning I knew, suddenly, that everything you've ever wanted is now all within your grasp.
Everything points to you getting everything you've ever wanted...and more!
    I looked up at the sky, which was a classical blue, punctuated with wispy clouds. I walked and walked Memo, listening to the joyous songs of all the birds around me. In the sky, the fast-moving puffy white clouds were forming an image, an image of a dragon! It was as if, in the brilliant sunlight, the sky was a path of golden light straight to my flowers. And presiding over all of this radiance was a dragon, seemingly on the lookout for someone upon which to bestow his ancient, astoundingly powerful luck.
    Could this someone be you, Memo?
    Are you the one about to leap over obstacles and barriers to wealth and joy and success? I'm almost sure of it.
Your life can change and your prayers,
  one by one, can all be answered
    Memo, as soon as I returned home from my walk in the garden, I began putting these images together for myself, like some fantastic, cosmic jigsaw puzzle. I knew I was meant to tell you all about it instantly, without delay. About how, putting all of this together can magically and swiftly change the path you are on, illuminate your future and transform your life in countless powerful and positive, fundamental ways, once and for all, now and forever.
The Nodes of the Moon and how they can
  change your life
    Amazingly enough you see, on July 9th, the Moon’s Nodes actually correspond to the Dragon and its many mystical properties and capabilities. 
    The Nodes, North and South, are known as the Dragon's Head (the North Node) and the Dragon's Tail, (the South Node).
    The North Node represents everything in life that is joyous, productive, optimistic and positive.
    Make no mistake. The influence and energy of the North Node is hugely lucky. Just as the Moon directly affects our tides and weather, it can also impact us in many more ways than you might dare expect. Indeed, its influences can seriously alter the course of your fate and happiness, wealth and accomplishments.
On July 9th, a trinity of good luck awaits you
    That’s the day you will be able to harness the commanding combined power of the North Node, Jupiter and the Jade Dragon. Your luck will be unstoppable! 
    Memo, with this unbeatable combination, the possibilities are limitless. The kind of extraordinary good luck you will experience on July 9th with this beautifully carved Jade Dragon can:
    Bring you the kind of windfall of money you haven't even allowed yourself to dream of...
    Free you from money worries, all money worries, and bring you a peace, tranquility and ease of being that has been your most precious wish for as long as you can recall...
    Bring you all the love and success you have always desired and knew you deserved, allowing you to live in a splendid place, travel in luxury, live without a care in the world...
    All together, it will move you much, much closer to the fulfillment of every one of your dreams.
    Memo, NOW you can see why I couldn't wait today to sit down and write to you!
     "Gold has a value but Jade is beyond value"
  (An ancient Chinese proverb)
    Did you know that the nickname for Jade is "Dream Stone"? That's because this precious commodity, prized by ancient civilizations for its unique richness and luster, has always been said to attract fantastic prosperity.
How to harness the luck of the Dragon and the Moon's energy and put them to work for you
    In all Eastern Ancient cultures, the Dragon symbolizes change, represents strength, good fortune and greatness. Because of its greatly perceived power, the Dragon has been associated with the authority of the Imperial Throne for thousands of years.
This Jade Dragon is where all of your newfound luck and joy begin
    Memo, this is an amulet so incredibly lovely, you'd wear it even if it wasn't about to completely alter your destiny, but it is!
    And to reward you for taking this crucial step towards wealth and happiness for yourself...
    And because I don't want you to hesitate for even a single second, I will be sending you, along with your Jade Dragon Amulet, these FREE GIFTS:
    Your FIRST FREE GIFT: A 22" gorgeous rope gold-plated vermeil chain for your Dragon, to wear it in style and beauty.

And for your SECOND FREE GIFT, I have for you a beautiful Jade Green, 100% silk scarf, decorated with the Dragon and the Yin and Yang symbols, representing how balanced your new life of luck will be.

And for your THIRD FREE GIFT Memo, to make sure your Jade Dragon is stored in a box that befits its importance and protects its powers when not in use, I will send you an elegant, black velvet presentation box.

And for your FOURTH FREE GIFT, I'll send you the book that points you in the direction of positive power and success, packed with intriguing facts and lore about your Jade Dragon Amulet, as well as guiding you to how to use this amazing talisman to achieve maximum benefits.

Just Pay For The Shipping and Handling
    Knowing how much this can help you get all that you want and deserve, I wanted to make sure the Jade Dragon gets into your hands by July 9th. So all I'm asking you to do is just send in the shipping and handling ($6.95) and I'll send you this powerful amulet so you can see how it can change your life, Obligation Free for 30 days.
Plus You Have My Unconditional Lifetime Money-Back Guarantee...
    If after those 30 days you decide to keep your Jade Dragon because it is improving your life and helping you be all you were meant to be, your credit card will be billed in only three easy installments of only $19.95. However, because you are a friend, Memo, and because I know you are one of the people who can really take advantage of this amulet’s incredible power, I will offer you my forever guarantee...
    Use, wear and enjoy your Jade Dragon for as long as you like...be it a month, two months, one year, ten years or more. If at any time you are not 110% satisfied with this magnificent piece, or if you feel it didn't help make you all you were meant to be, or even if you just change your mind, just return it to me, and I will make sure you get a complete refund, including the cost of shipping and handling...immediately! 
    No questions, no argument and no explanation will be necessary. But no matter what, you can still keep the exquisite Gold vermeil chain, 100% silk scarf, presentation box and booklet as my free gifts to you.
The powerful combination of the Jade Dragon, the Moon and Jupiter are waiting to work their magic
    Memo, please don't delay. July 9th will be here before you know it. Remember, this exceptionally powerful amulet comes to you with three extraordinary qualities:
It is a Dragon. (Lucky)
It is Jade. (Power and understanding)
It relates to the North Node of the Moon. (Energy. Positive energy!)
    Perhaps that translates for you into a much-needed unforeseen avalanche of cash, a letter from an old love or friend you’ve been wanting to reconnect with, a job offer of a lifetime or a chronic health problem that just seems to clear up as suddenly as it arrived.
    Memo, I put great stock in my intuition and in this case the images were so clear and so commanding, I would expect nothing less than miracles for you.
   Your friend,
       
    Bethea 









If you no longer wish to receive any emails from me, you may click on the link below. But by doing this, Memo, it means that I will not be able to send you exclusive opportunities for offers and discounts or important updates on astrological events and how they'll affect you. To follow good Internet etiquette, once you've asked to be deleted from one kind of email from me, I'm required to stop contacting you entirely. So, Memo, if you wish to no longer receive any emails from me, simply click here or send a letter to me at 167 Cherry St. PMB 292, Milford CT 06460-3400.
